As part of the DTS Group, DTS CLOUD SECURITY MonEPE supports customers, as an established IT service provider, in the focus areas data center, technology and security. With our two own certified German data centers and over 350 employees at 14 locations in Germany and Greece, we offer customers versatile, innovative and hybrid solutions. Flat hierarchies, friendly atmosphere, sustainable personnel development and an open-door culture - that's DTS.

Technical PreSales Engineer (m/f/d) – IT Infrastructure

Location: Athens or Thessaloniki

Immediately

Full-time, permanent contract

Your Tasks

As a Technical PreSales Engineer (f/m/d) - IT Infrastructure, you are actively involved in the day-to-day business of our data center/cloud team and are very familiar with the interaction of individual technical departments. The following activities fall within your area of responsibility:

Due to your professional expertise, you will be entrusted with tasks in the areas of network, virtualization, storage, operating systems and/or cloud services

You actively support the day-to-day business in the continuous (further) development of our customers' cloud infrastructures and, in addition to account management, serve as an important instance in the sales of our portfolio

You will also inspire our customers with your strong technical understanding of DTS as a long-term managed service provider by putting previous IT concepts to the test

In order to ensure that the project runs smoothly, you will be in constant contact with other technical and sales departments

Depending on your interests, we also offer you the big stage and you act as a speaker at workshops and events

Your Know-how

2 years of professional experience in technical project management and/or sales of IT services that require explanation

Good knowledge of using technologies from the Linux, Microsoft, public cloud or storage environment

Responsible and service-oriented action with above-average problem-solving and change skills

Ability to inspire our customers with ease for our technical solutions and services

Very good knowledge of spoken and written German and English

Your Personality

Excellent communication skills, also across teams

Open and confident demeanor and presentation skills

Proactive, service and solution oriented mindset

Independent and reliable way of working

Enjoy continuous learning

Our Offer

Team-oriented working environment and a variety of tasks

We provide private health insurance for our employees

Space for your own ideas

Intensive training (approx. 4 to 6 months) in Germany at our expense (depending on the development of the Covid-19 regulations)

One monthly flight back during the training period

Compatibility of family, leisure time and career

Continuous opportunity for personal and professional development

An accompanied gentle introduction

Become part of our team and bring in your professional knowledge as well as your positive personality traits!

Have we aroused your interest? If so, we look forward to receiving your detailed application, stating your desired (gross) salary and the earliest possible starting date.

Do you have any further questions about your career at DTS? Please give us a call!

https://www.dts.de/en/career/jobs/details/20604

Theofanous 4 & Kifisias Avenue corner – 2nd floor

Ergomatic Ltd, founded in Athens in 2004, is firmly established in the field of Technological Building Equipment, Parking Management Systems and Controlled Personnel Access. With years of experience in residential, commercial, and industrial automation products – we design and implement a diverse array of innovative solutions.

Ergomatic Ltd. is looking for a team-spirited individual to join our team with the role of IT Support Engineer mainly for the preparation, installation and support of Parking Management and Access Control Systems.

Responsibilities:
Troubleshoot issues and provide support to employees

Troubleshoot issues in cooperation with system’s vendor and apply optimal solution to end customer’s installation

Install and configure software and hardware (PCs. Laptops, Windows, Linux)

Set up accounts and workstations with required permissions

Manage Microsoft Office 365 applications and users (Exchange, Planner, One Drive for Business, Microsoft Teams, Power Apps)

Patch and upgrade systems and applications, installing fixes and new releases

Create and maintain technical documentation, inventory, manuals and IT procedures

Participate in procurement and vendor proposal evaluation processes

Maintenance and development of company’s website


BSc Degree in Computer Science

2 - 3 years of experience as a System Administrator, Network Administrator, Technical Support Engineer or similar role

Windows 10, Office 365 setup and configuration

Experience with database maintenance (MS SQL, MongoDB) and networks (LAN, WAN)

Experience with Linux operating systems (Raspbian, Ubuntu) and the terminal

Knowledge of system security and data backup/ restore

Familiarity with Parking Management, Access Control, License Plate Recognition and CCTV systems is desirable

Job_title: Golang System Software Engineer - Containers / Virtualisation
Description:
We are hiring a Golang software engineer to work on the low level Go codebase sitting between our REST API and the low level C libraries used to manage containers and virtual machines. We are looking for system-level developers with experience in design and data management/modeling.
The LXD team is responsible for the design, development and evolution of LXD, a modern system container and virtual machine manager that is widely used on Ubuntu, ChromeOS and other Linux platforms. LXD components span the entire software stack from low-level kernel features to the upper level management REST API and CLI.
This is an opportunity for someone who wants to have a meaningful impact on modern cloud computing technologies. Canonical offers a fun, fast-paced team environment and a career full of learning and development.

Description:
Viva Wallet is a leading European cloud-based neobank, delivering the future of payments, now. With presence in 24 markets, it is the payment institution with the largest footprint in Europe. Viva Wallet's mission is to change the way businesses pay and get paid, offering truly unifying, yet localized, end-to-end advanced digital payments solutions and embedded banking services tailored to their needs. Latest innovations include “tap-on-phone Viva Wallet POS app” turning any Android mobile to a card terminal, and “Smart Checkout” payment gateway that can increase conversion by 21%. An advocate of sustainable cashless economy, Viva Wallet harnesses the power of their disruptive in-house technologies to provide digital payments services in 19 languages and 9 currencies, featuring over 24 payment methods.
The Team

Description:
WeatherXM is building the world’s largest, community-powered, web3-native weather network to provide accurate, hyperlocal weather services to consumers and businesses. Based on low-cost web3 weather stations, WeatherXM allows anyone to become a weather station operator and earn rewards for collecting and validating weather data.
WeatherXM’s vision is to act as a web3 weather oracle to be used by on-chain protocols that have to make decisions based on weather conditions.
WeatherXM AG has raised $5M in seed funding to fuel the growth of their community-powered IoT weather station network. Placeholder VC led the round, joined by metaplanet, ConsenSys Mesh, dlab (SOSV), Protocol Labs, Borderless Capital, DLTx and several prominent angel investors including Juan Benet (Filecoin), Maxwell Krohn, Dimitris Togias and Ele Diakomichalis (Radicle).

MAN Energy Solutions enables it customers to achieve sustainable value creation in the transition towards a carbon neutral future. Addressing tomorrow's challenges within the marine, energy and industrial sectors, we improve efficiency and performance at a systematic level. Leading the way in advanced engineering for more than 250 years, we provide a unique portfolio of technologies. Headquartered in Germany, MAN Energy Solutions employs some 15,000 people at over 120 sites globally. Our after sales brand, MAN PrimeServ offers a vast network of service centers to our customers all over the world.
MAN Energy Solution Hellas Ltd is looking for a Data Engineer to work on identification of Internal Combustion Engine Components, Construction of Engine Spare Parts List Database and Maintenance of Spares Parts Database. The job requires you to work independently while you have a strong sense of community and can work in teams.

Our work environment is characterized by openness, where knowledge sharing is a natural part of everyday life. Freedom with responsibility is an integral part of our corporate culture.

Job_title: Software Engineer - Data (Athens Office or Remote in Greece)
Description:
Pollfish is an online market research platform where data driven brands bring market research in-house for faster and smarter decision making.
We have a proprietary network of 600M consumers which enables companies to connect with and understand real consumers worldwide in a fast, easy and cost-effective way.
We have a fresh perspective on market research. Our team is passionate about redefining the way it is talked about, thought about, and conducted.
Pollfish lives in the cloud, and is deployed several times a day using Kubernetes. A reactive microservice architecture underpins the entire platform. The core application is written in Play (Scala), while the vast majority of the supporting services are using the proven Twitter stack.

Description:
WeatherXM is building the world's largest, community-powered, web3-native weather network to provide accurate, hyperlocal weather services to consumers and businesses. Based on low-cost web3 weather stations, WeatherXM allows anyone to become a weather station operator and earn rewards for collecting and validating weather data.
WeatherXM’s vision is to act as a web3 weather oracle to be used by on-chain protocols that have to make decisions based on weather conditions.
WeatherXM AG has raised $5M in seed funding to fuel the growth of their community-powered IoT weather station network. Placeholder VC led the round, joined by metaplanet, ConsenSys Mesh, dlab (SOSV), Protocol Labs, Borderless Capital, DLTx and several prominent angel investors including Juan Benet (Filecoin), Maxwell Krohn, Dimitris Togias and Ele Diakomichalis (Radicle).

Who are we?
Satori is an Analytics Agency made with one simple vision: to give clarity in decision making through data analytics.
Whether it’s a cloud-based big data ecosystem for a global fintech or a machine learning model predicting churn for a leading airline group, Satori develops cutting edge analytics solutions, providing real value to its clients. Services cover the whole data lifecycle from ingestion and warehousing to ML and AI applications.
Satori is a scale-up, well on track to become the leading data and analytics company in South-Eastern Europe, and already a 70+ specialized tech team consisting of Data Engineers, Data Scientists, Software Engineers, QAs, and CRM Specialists, delivering innovative data, tech, and customer experience solutions. The majority of our clients are household names and global brands in FMCG, retail, e-commerce, financial services, and travel, with a footprint in Greece but also across Europe and beyond.

Description:
Help us shape the future of photography
Born out of a passion for photography, we provide photographers with the tools to easily collaborate with clients and creatives, achieve the highest quality photographs, and bring their visions to life. We are on a journey to become the most efficient ecosystem of creative and collaborative tools with a flexible photography workflow seamlessly spanning across multiple devices, letting you work from anywhere and with anyone.

The role
Analytics are at the heart of Capture One’s success. In this role, you will empower the business through connecting the data of our 250K+ global customers, which enables us to turn data into actionable insights in support of our ambitious growth goals. We are looking for a Senior Data Engineer to become part of our Data & Insights team. You will build data pipelines to support decision-making across Finance, Marketing, Sales and Product & Technology. You will also have the opportunity to build machine learning models that help us act faster on customer needs. Our data architecture is based on Microsoft’s cloud service Azure, and we primarily use Power BI for our self-serve reporting.

Description:
Intelligencia.ai is a technology company at the heart of Healthcare and AI. Our mission is to bring novel therapies to patients faster and more efficiently by applying Data Science to Drug Development. We are pioneering the use of AI for assessing and addressing fundamental risks to maximize the odds of multiple life changing therapeutics.
Our people are the core of our success. We are a fast growing company that operates in a diverse, cross-functional and flexible environment. Our team consists of intellectually curious minds with a can-do attitude that love what they do and enjoy being part of a highly collaborative team. Together, we are solving complex problems and making a positive impact on people's lives by building cutting-edge technologies.
Our Engineering team is focused on applying engineering rigor and innovative design elements to our machine learning driven platform with a mission to accelerate drug development process. This role will be a key contributor to the design and implementation of data engineering pipelines to ingest billions of data points across hundreds of features from publications, patents, genomics, and many other sources.

Description:
Canonical is building a comprehensive automation suite to deliver a multi-cloud and on-premise data solution for the enterprise, which spans the full range of data stores and data technologies from big data, with Yugabyte, Spark and Kafka, through NoSQL and cache-layer capabilities like Redis, MongoDB and Opensearch, all the way to structured SQL engines like PostgreSQL and MySQL.
This is an exceptional opportunity for an experienced software engineer passionate about delivering high quality, reliable and automated infrastructure based on open source software running on Kubernetes, the public cloud and bare-metal. We are facing the challenge of fault-tolerant mission critical distributed systems and intend to deliver the world's best automation solution for delivering data platforms.
Experience using data platform tools is desirable, but not over hands-on experience installing, configuring and operating such technologies.

Description:
With over 2,000 employees of more than 88 nationalities, Exness is the place for global teamwork, incredible leadership, a learning culture, and constant development. Unlimited by time zones, Exnessians from around the world have worked seamlessly together since 2008 to provide our traders with the best possible trading experience. Today, we stand proud with over 300,000 active traders and 2.5 trillion USD in monthly trading volume.
Your role at Exness:
We are looking for an experienced data engineer who will join our Technology department to be part of a team of more than 400 engineers that creates cutting-edge solutions and constantly raises the bar.
This department focuses on developing products in the trading market and creating solutions from the moment of registration of clients to the moment of withdrawal of funds. Our technologies include resolutions that support customer journeys (identity management, billing management), trading interfaces (FIX, REST, WS, Algo), back-office interfaces (Personal Area, Payment Solutions, Back Office), centers of expertise (QA, DevOps, security), technology platforms (Orchestration, internal PaaS/SaaS), and much more.

Description:
Viva Wallet is a leading European cloud-based neobank, delivering the future of payments, now. With presence in 24 markets, it is the payment institution with the largest footprint in Europe. Viva Wallet's mission is to change the way businesses pay and get paid, offering truly unifying, yet localized, end-to-end advanced digital payments solutions and embedded banking services tailored to their needs. Latest innovations include “tap-on-phone Viva Wallet POS app” turning any Android mobile to a card terminal, and “Smart Checkout” payment gateway that can increase conversion by 21%. An advocate of sustainable cashless economy, Viva Wallet harnesses the power of their disruptive in-house technologies to provide digital payments services in 19 languages and 9 currencies, featuring over 24 payment methods.
The Team
The Data Services team of the BI Team is in charge of designing, implementing and maintaining a set of tools (APIs and services) which collect data (from data sources or event brokers), aggregate & distribute it both internally (services & apps) & externally (data direct to the customer, corporate website/backoffice/mobile app, 3rd party apps, country authorities across Europe etc.)

Description:
We're looking for a Senior Go Engineer to join us here at GWI. Not just any Senior Go Engineer though. Someone ambitious and genuine, who works best in the midst of a collaborative and forward-thinking team. That's because as a GWIer you'll be immersed in the fast-moving world of data tech. We think big to make an impact, we're not afraid to ask why, and we always show respect. Those values are what got us where we are today, and they're a big part of what we're looking for in you.
About the job
At GWI we understand that software engineering is a multidisciplinary field that requires a team effort. Our mission as an engineering team in the company is to:

Description:
At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.

The Opportunity

As part of our Data and Analytics team of Advisory practice you will work with multi-disciplinary teams to support clients in a wide range of big data initiatives aiming to generate and present new, useful and actionable insights. You will have the opportunity to work and take responsibilities in challenging engagements, gaining exposure to clients in various sectors both in Greece and abroad.

We are Kaizen Gaming
Kaizen Gaming is the leading GameTech company in Greece and one of the fastest-growing in Europe, with the Stoiximan brand in Greece and Cyprus and Betano in Germany, Romania, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Portugal, Brazil, Chile, Peru, Ecuador and Canada. Our aim is to leverage cutting-edge Technology in order to provide the optimum experience to those who trust us for their entertainment.
The role & the team
As a Senior Frontend Engineer - Team Lead in one of our multidisciplinary autonomous Scrum teams you will develop modern applications for our products by using state of the art technologies. You will guide your team by analyzing and implementing new features focusing on our Sportsbook platform which includes a variety of services. More specifically, you will participate in the requirements elicitation, technical analysis and in collaboration with UI/UX designers you will have the opportunity to offer the best experience to our customers. Together with the Principal Engineer and the rest of your team members, you will be responsible for the full development cycle of new features and take ownership of the applications the team has created.

Description:
WeatherXM is building the world's largest, community-powered, web3-native weather network to provide accurate, hyperlocal weather services to consumers and businesses. Based on low-cost web3 weather stations, WeatherXM allows anyone to become a weather station operator and earn rewards for collecting and validating weather data.
WeatherXM’s vision is to act as a web3 weather oracle to be used by on-chain protocols that have to make decisions based on weather conditions.
WeatherXM AG has raised $5M in seed funding to fuel the growth of their community-powered IoT weather station network. Placeholder VC led the round, joined by metaplanet, ConsenSys Mesh, dlab (SOSV), Protocol Labs, Borderless Capital, DLTx and several prominent angel investors including Juan Benet (Filecoin), Maxwell Krohn, Dimitris Togias and Ele Diakomichalis (Radicle).

We are ''PBM INVESTOR SERVICES A.E.'' an investment company based in the centre of Athens that is seeking to hire a full-time employee with 3-5 years of experience in blockchain technology and coding.
Responsibilities:
1. Collaborating with managers to determine blockchain technology needs and envisaged functionalities.
2. Creating application features and interfaces by using programming languages and writing multithreaded codes.
3. Applying the latest cryptology techniques to protect digital transaction data against cyberattacks and information hacks.

We are looking for a Data Engineer to join our team! If you are an enthusiastic Data Engineer who enjoy to design, develop, test, and maintain data architectures and systems, enabling the company to efficiently process, analyze and utilize data; then you are a fit for the role! Transforming raw data into useful information providing the organization with decision-making insights is part of the job!

Job Responsibilities

Design and build data pipelines
Design and maintain data storage and infrastructure

Based at our Limassol office, the successful candidate will be part of a team which will be responsible for the correct, timely and efficient flow of data from various source systems to various end points.

Description:
Intelligencia.ai is a technology company at the heart of Healthcare and AI. Our mission is to bring novel therapies to patients faster and more efficiently by applying Data Science to Drug Development. We are pioneering the use of AI for assessing and addressing fundamental risks to maximize the odds of multiple life changing therapeutics.
Our people are the core of our success. We are a fast growing company that operates in a diverse, cross-functional and flexible environment. Our team consists of intellectually curious minds with a can-do attitude that love what they do and enjoy being part of a highly collaborative team. Together, we are solving complex problems and making a positive impact on people's lives by building cutting-edge technologies.
Our Engineering team is focused on applying engineering rigor and innovative design elements to our machine learning driven platform with a mission to accelerate drug development process. Description:
Canonical is building a comprehensive automation suite to deliver a multi-cloud and on-premise data solution for the enterprise, which spans the full range of data stores and data technologies from big data, with Yugabyte, Spark and Kafka, through NoSQL and cache-layer capabilities like Redis, MongoDB and Opensearch, all the way to structured SQL engines like PostgreSQL and MySQL.
This is an exceptional opportunity for an experienced software engineer passionate about delivering high quality, reliable and automated infrastructure based on open source software running on Kubernetes, the public cloud and bare-metal. We are facing the challenge of fault-tolerant mission critical distributed systems and intend to deliver the world's best automation solution for delivering data platforms.
Experience using data platform tools is desirable, but not over hands-on experience installing, configuring and operating such technologies.

Description:
Help us shape the future of photography
Born out of a passion for photography, we provide photographers with the tools to easily collaborate with clients and creatives, achieve the highest quality photographs, and bring their visions to life. We are on a journey to become the most efficient ecosystem of creative and collaborative tools with a flexible photography workflow seamlessly spanning across multiple devices, letting you work from anywhere and with anyone.

The role
Analytics are at the heart of Capture One’s success. In this role, you will empower the business through connecting the data of our 250K+ global customers, which enables us to turn data into actionable insights in support of our ambitious growth goals. We are looking for a Senior Data Engineer to become part of our Data & Insights team. You will build data pipelines to support decision-making across Finance, Marketing, Sales and Product & Technology. You will also have the opportunity to build machine learning models that help us act faster on customer needs. Our data architecture is based on Microsoft’s cloud service Azure, and we primarily use Power BI for our self-serve reporting.

Description:
With over 2,000 employees of more than 88 nationalities, Exness is the place for global teamwork, incredible leadership, a learning culture, and constant development. Unlimited by time zones, Exnessians from around the world have worked seamlessly together since 2008 to provide our traders with the best possible trading experience. Today, we stand proud with over 300,000 active traders and 2.5 trillion USD in monthly trading volume.
Your role at Exness:
We are looking for an experienced data engineer who will join our Technology department to be part of a team of more than 400 engineers that creates cutting-edge solutions and constantly raises the bar.
This department focuses on developing products in the trading market and creating solutions from the moment of registration of clients to the moment of withdrawal of funds. Our technologies include resolutions that support customer journeys (identity management, billing management), trading interfaces (FIX, REST, WS, Algo), back-office interfaces (Personal Area, Payment Solutions, Back Office), centers of expertise (QA, DevOps, security), technology platforms (Orchestration, internal PaaS/SaaS), and much more.

Description:
Viva Wallet is a leading European cloud-based neobank, delivering the future of payments, now. With presence in 24 markets, it is the payment institution with the largest footprint in Europe. Viva Wallet's mission is to change the way businesses pay and get paid, offering truly unifying, yet localized, end-to-end advanced digital payments solutions and embedded banking services tailored to their needs. Latest innovations include “tap-on-phone Viva Wallet POS app” turning any Android mobile to a card terminal, and “Smart Checkout” payment gateway that can increase conversion by 21%. An advocate of sustainable cashless economy, Viva Wallet harnesses the power of their disruptive in-house technologies to provide digital payments services in 19 languages and 9 currencies, featuring over 24 payment methods.
The Team
The Data Services team of the BI Team is in charge of designing, implementing and maintaining a set of tools (APIs and services) which collect data (from data sources or event brokers), aggregate & distribute it both internally (services & apps) & externally (data direct to the customer, corporate website/backoffice/mobile app, 3rd party apps, country authorities across Europe etc.)

Description:
Viva Wallet is a leading European cloud-based neobank, delivering the future of payments, now. With presence in 24 markets, it is the payment institution with the largest footprint in Europe. Viva Wallet's mission is to change the way businesses pay and get paid, offering truly unifying, yet localized, end-to-end advanced digital payments solutions and embedded banking services tailored to their needs. Latest innovations include “tap-on-phone Viva Wallet POS app” turning any Android mobile to a card terminal, and “Smart Checkout” payment gateway that can increase conversion by 21%. An advocate of sustainable cashless economy, Viva Wallet harnesses the power of their disruptive in-house technologies to provide digital payments services in 19 languages and 9 currencies, featuring over 24 payment methods.
The Team
The Business Intelligence and Analytics team's purpose is to improve business decisions by providing all necessary information to all sectors (Management, Finance, Sales, Risk etc) using data gathered both internally and externally.

Position Summary
Authentic Gaming is a supplier of Premium Live Casino software and services. Description:
At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.

The Opportunity

As part of our Data and Analytics team of Advisory practice you will work with multi-disciplinary teams to support clients in a wide range of big data initiatives aiming to generate and present new, useful and actionable insights. You will have the opportunity to work and take responsibilities in challenging engagements, gaining exposure to clients in various sectors both in Greece and abroad.

We are Kaizen Gaming
Kaizen Gaming is the leading GameTech company in Greece and one of the fastest-growing in Europe, with the Stoiximan brand in Greece and Cyprus and Betano in Germany, Romania, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Portugal, Brazil, Chile, Peru, Ecuador and Canada. Our aim is to leverage cutting-edge Technology in order to provide the optimum experience to those who trust us for their entertainment.
The role & the team
As a Senior Frontend Engineer - Team Lead in one of our multidisciplinary autonomous Scrum teams you will develop modern applications for our products by using state of the art technologies. You will guide your team by analyzing and implementing new features focusing on our Sportsbook platform which includes a variety of services. More specifically, you will participate in the requirements elicitation, technical analysis and in collaboration with UI/UX designers you will have the opportunity to offer the best experience to our customers. Together with the Principal Engineer and the rest of your team members, you will be responsible for the full development cycle of new features and take ownership of the applications the team has created.

Description:
Margera is a boutique analytics agency founded by an x-Googler. We help Enterprise companies grow through the use of data and analytics. We are proud to support top companies in various industries such as banks (Eurobank, Piraeus Bank, Astrobank), travel-related (Aegean Airlines, Sani/ikos Hotels), tobacco (Philip Morris in 6 countries) and gaming (OPAP, Stoiximan, novibet). Our main services are Digital Analytics (we are the only Google Analytics Sales Partner in Greece/Cyprus), Data warehousing (on-prem or on the Cloud), BI and Machine Learning.

We have an ambitious growth plan (x5 in 3 years) and we are looking for a professional who will be joining our Data Engineering Team.

Description:
With more than 20 years of proven experience, QUALCO is a leading Fintech solutions provider, offering a wide range of analytics-driven, highly scalable enterprise software solutions in over 35 countries worldwide. Our end-to-end technology solutions cover a wide range of needs for Banking, Financial Services, Utilities, Insurance, Retail organisations, and beyond.

The Data Engineer will be responsible for designing and optimizing the department’s current and future data related solutions and act as a champion for data integrity, consistency and reusability within all areas of analytics, by adopting a product-oriented approach to the creation of analytics deliverables.
Work closely with other team members on data initiatives and ensure optimal data delivery architecture is consistent throughout ongoing projects;
Design, implement, maintain, monitor and optimize current and future data/reporting/analytics platforms/solutions in order to address data related needs;

Competences



Competitive compensation, ticket restaurant card, and annual bonus programs
Cutting-edge IT equipment, mobile, and data plan
Modern facilities, free coffee and beverages, and indoor parking
‍ Private health insurance, onsite occupational doctor, and workplace counselor
️ Flexible working model
‍ ️ Onsite gym, wellness facilities, and ping pong room
Career and talent development tools
Mentoring, coaching, personalized annual learning and development plan
Employee referral bonus, regular wellbeing, ESG, and volunteering activities
Your race, gender identity, expression, age ethnicity, or disability make no difference in Qualco Group. We want to attract, develop, promote, and retain the best people based on their abilities and behavior.
Qualco Group collects and processes personal data in accordance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). We are bound to use the information provided within your job application for recruitment purposes only and not to share these with any third parties. We will keep your resume in our database for any future consideration. In case you want to be deleted from our database, please contact us.

Description:
Satori is an Analytics Agency made with one simple vision: to give clarity in decision making through data analytics.
Whether it’s a cloud-based big data ecosystem for a global fintech or a machine learning model predicting churn for a leading airline group, Satori develops cutting edge analytics solutions, providing real value to its clients. Services cover the whole data lifecycle from ingestion and warehousing to ML and AI applications.

Satori is a scale-up, well on track to become the leading data and analytics company in South-Eastern Europe and already a 65+ specialized tech team, consisting of Data Engineers, Data Scientists, Software Engineers, QAs, and CRM Specialists, delivering innovative data, tech, and customer experience solutions. The majority of our clients are household names and global brands in FMCG, retail, ecommerce, financial services, and travel, with a footprint in Greece but also across Europe and beyond.

Description:
Intelligencia.ai is a technology company at the heart of Healthcare and AI. Our mission is to bring novel therapies to patients faster and more efficiently by applying Data Science to Drug Development. We are pioneering the use of AI for assessing and addressing fundamental risks to maximize the odds of multiple life changing therapeutics.
Our people are the core of our success. We are a fast growing company that operates in a diverse, cross-functional and flexible environment. Our team consists of intellectually curious minds with a can-do attitude that love what they do and enjoy being part of a highly collaborative team. Together, we are solving complex problems and making a positive impact on people's lives by building cutting-edge technologies.
Our Engineering team is focused on applying engineering rigor and innovative design elements to our machine learning driven platform with a mission to accelerate drug development process. This role will be a key contributor to the design and implementation of data engineering pipelines to ingest billions of data points across hundreds of features from publications, patents, genomics, and many other sources.

Description:
With over 2,000 employees of more than 88 nationalities, Exness is the place for global teamwork, incredible leadership, a learning culture, and constant development. Unlimited by time zones, Exnessians from around the world have worked seamlessly together since 2008 to provide our traders with the best possible trading experience. Today, we stand proud with over 300,000 active traders and 2.5 trillion USD in monthly trading volume.
Your role at Exness:
We are looking for an experienced data engineer who will join our Technology department to be part of a team of more than 400 engineers that creates cutting-edge solutions and constantly raises the bar.
This department focuses on developing products in the trading market and creating solutions from the moment of registration of clients to the moment of withdrawal of funds. Our technologies include resolutions that support customer journeys (identity management, billing management), trading interfaces (FIX, REST, WS, Algo), back-office interfaces (Personal Area, Payment Solutions, Back Office), centers of expertise (QA, DevOps, security), technology platforms (Orchestration, internal PaaS/SaaS), and much more.

Description:
Canonical is building a comprehensive automation suite to deliver a multi-cloud and on-premise data solution for the enterprise, which spans the full range of data stores and data technologies from big data, with Yugabyte, Spark and Kafka, through NoSQL and cache-layer capabilities like Redis, MongoDB and Opensearch, all the way to structured SQL engines like PostgreSQL and MySQL.
This is an exceptional opportunity for an experienced software engineer passionate about delivering high quality, reliable and automated infrastructure based on open source software running on Kubernetes, the public cloud and bare-metal. We are facing the challenge of fault-tolerant mission critical distributed systems and intend to deliver the world's best automation solution for delivering data platforms.
Experience using data platform tools is desirable, but not over hands-on experience installing, configuring and operating such technologies.

Kaizen Gaming is the leading GameTech company in Greece and one of the fastest-growing in Europe, with the Stoiximan brand in Greece and Cyprus and Betano in Germany, Romania, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Portugal, Brazil, Chile, Peru, Ecuador and Canada. Our aim is to leverage cutting-edge Technology in order to provide the optimum experience to those who trust us for their entertainment.
The Team

At Kaizen, our aim is to make data driven decisions in order to automate our services while also focusing on offering tailored customer experiences. Our machine learning team is dedicated to this mission by building a variety of models, from binary classification tasks up to recommendation systems. We focus on transforming business needs into production applications and we cover a wide range of business sectors utilizing different data types and handling a broad project diversity.

Description:
WeatherXM is building the world’s largest, community-powered, web3-native weather network to provide accurate, hyperlocal weather services to consumers and businesses. Based on low-cost web3 weather stations, WeatherXM allows anyone to become a weather station operator and earn rewards for collecting and validating weather data.
WeatherXM’s vision is to act as a web3 weather oracle to be used by on-chain protocols that have to make decisions based on weather conditions.
WeatherXM AG has raised $5M in seed funding to fuel the growth of their community-powered IoT weather station network. Placeholder VC led the round, joined by metaplanet, ConsenSys Mesh, dlab (SOSV), Protocol Labs, Borderless Capital, DLTx and several prominent angel investors including Juan Benet (Filecoin), Maxwell Krohn, Dimitris Togias and Ele Diakomichalis (Radicle).

Role purpose:
The Senior Big Data Engineer will design, implement, and maintain data pipelines in the Google Cloud Platform. The role is accountable to work closely with Product Owner to understand business needs and objectives as well as with BI Engineer to ensure the smooth data feed from various sources to GCP and afterward to Digital & Pega Destinations.
Key accountabilities and decision ownership:
Work closely with Product Owner, Solution Architect and Engineers to develop new flows and migrate the existing on premises infrastructure to GCP.

Description:
What you should know about us
MAN Energy Solutions enables it customers to achieve sustainable value creation in the transition towards a carbon neutral future. Addressing tomorrow's challenges within the marine, energy and industrial sectors, we improve efficiency and performance at a systematic level. Leading the way in advanced engineering for more than 250 years, we provide a unique portfolio of technologies. Headquartered in Germany, MAN Energy Solutions employs some 15,000 people at over 120 sites globally. Our after sales brand, MAN PrimeServ offers a vast network of service centers to our customers all over the world.
MAN Energy Solution Hellas Ltd is looking for a Data Engineer to work on identification of Internal Combustion Engine Components, Construction of Engine Spare Parts List Database and Maintenance of Spares Parts Database. The job requires you to work independently while you have a strong sense of community and can work in teams.

Our work environment is characterized by openness, where knowledge sharing is a natural part of everyday life. Freedom with responsibility is an integral part of our corporate culture.

Description:
Viva Wallet is a leading European cloud-based neobank, delivering the future of payments, now. With presence in 24 markets, it is the payment institution with the largest footprint in Europe. Viva Wallet's mission is to change the way businesses pay and get paid, offering truly unifying, yet localized, end-to-end advanced digital payments solutions and embedded banking services tailored to their needs. Latest innovations include “tap-on-phone Viva Wallet POS app” turning any Android mobile to a card terminal, and “Smart Checkout” payment gateway that can increase conversion by 21%. An advocate of sustainable cashless economy, Viva Wallet harnesses the power of their disruptive in-house technologies to provide digital payments services in 19 languages and 9 currencies, featuring over 24 payment methods.
The Team
The Business Intelligence and Analytics team's purpose is to improve business decisions by providing all necessary information to all sectors (Management, Finance, Sales, Risk etc) using data gathered both internally and externally.

Position Summary
Authentic Gaming is a supplier of Premium Live Casino software and services. With an established global presence, we offer the players of our B2B clients, premium, interactive, live-streamed games from exotic land-based casinos and live broadcasting studios. Our live casino games can be found on more than 200 websites, many of whom belong to leading Tier 1 online gaming operators. Core to Authentic Gaming’s ongoing success is our technology, a no legacy live gaming platform as well as our talented specialist team. The company employs 200 gaming professionals that are located in offices and studios in Malta, Slovakia and Spain.
Authentic Gaming is a player-centric company with a passion for creating the best mobile and desktop live casino products & experience.

Description:
We're looking for a Senior Go Engineer to join us here at GWI. Not just any Senior Go Engineer though. Someone ambitious and genuine, who works best in the midst of a collaborative and forward-thinking team. That's because as a GWIer you'll be immersed in the fast-moving world of data tech. Description:
Satori is an Analytics Agency made with one simple vision: to give clarity in decision making through data analytics.
Whether it’s a cloud-based big data ecosystem for a global fintech or a machine learning model predicting churn for a leading airline group, Satori develops cutting edge analytics solutions, providing real value to its clients. Services cover the whole data lifecycle from ingestion and warehousing to ML and AI applications.

Satori is a scale-up, well on track to become the leading data and analytics company in South-Eastern Europe and already a 65+ specialized tech team, consisting of Data Engineers, Data Scientists, Software Engineers, QAs, and CRM Specialists, delivering innovative data, tech, and customer experience solutions. The majority of our clients are household names and global brands in FMCG, retail, ecommerce, financial services, and travel, with a footprint in Greece but also across Europe and beyond.

Description:
At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.

The Opportunity

As part of our Data and Analytics team of Advisory practice you will work with multi-disciplinary teams to support clients in a wide range of big data initiatives aiming to generate and present new, useful and actionable insights. You will have the opportunity to work and take responsibilities in challenging engagements, gaining exposure to clients in various sectors both in Greece and abroad.

With over 2,000 employees of more than 88 nationalities, Exness is the place for global teamwork, incredible leadership, a learning culture, and constant development. Unlimited by time zones, Exnessians from around the world have worked seamlessly together since 2008 to provide our traders with the best possible trading experience. Today, we stand proud with over 300,000 active traders and 2.5 trillion USD in monthly trading volume.
Your role at Exness:
You will join our Market-making Operations team that combines unique expertise, knowledge, and responsibilities to continuously improve the pricing, execution models, and trading experience of our clients. You will be responsible for the administration of the core trading functions, maintaining trading platform components to provide the highest quality of services to clients. As a source of unique knowledge and experience, you will also play a crucial role in supporting all the teams within the company to achieve ambitious goals together.

Description:
Intelligencia.ai is a technology company at the heart of Healthcare and AI. Our mission is to bring novel therapies to patients faster and more efficiently by applying Data Science to Drug Development. We are pioneering the use of AI for assessing and addressing fundamental risks to maximize the odds of multiple life changing therapeutics.
Our people are the core of our success. We are a fast growing company that operates in a diverse, cross-functional and flexible environment. Our team consists of intellectually curious minds with a can-do attitude that love what they do and enjoy being part of a highly collaborative team. Together, we are solving complex problems and making a positive impact on people's lives by building cutting-edge technologies.
Our Engineering team is focused on applying engineering rigor and innovative design elements to our machine learning driven platform with a mission to accelerate drug development process. This role will be a key contributor to the design and implementation of data engineering pipelines to ingest billions of data points across hundreds of features from publications, patents, genomics, and many other sources.

Description:
With over 2,000 employees of more than 88 nationalities, Exness is the place for global teamwork, incredible leadership, a learning culture, and constant development. Unlimited by time zones, Exnessians from around the world have worked seamlessly together since 2008 to provide our traders with the best possible trading experience. Today, we stand proud with over 300,000 active traders and 2.5 trillion USD in monthly trading volume.
Your role at Exness:
We are looking for an experienced data engineer who will join our Technology department to be part of a team of more than 400 engineers that creates cutting-edge solutions and constantly raises the bar.
This department focuses on developing products in the trading market and creating solutions from the moment of registration of clients to the moment of withdrawal of funds. Our technologies include resolutions that support customer journeys (identity management, billing management), trading interfaces (FIX, REST, WS, Algo), back-office interfaces (Personal Area, Payment Solutions, Back Office), centers of expertise (QA, DevOps, security), technology platforms (Orchestration, internal PaaS/SaaS), and much more.

Description:
Canonical is building a comprehensive automation suite to deliver a multi-cloud and on-premise data solution for the enterprise, which spans the full range of data stores and data technologies from big data, with Yugabyte, Spark and Kafka, through NoSQL and cache-layer capabilities like Redis, MongoDB and Opensearch, all the way to structured SQL engines like PostgreSQL and MySQL.
This is an exceptional opportunity for an experienced software engineer passionate about delivering high quality, reliable and automated infrastructure based on open source software running on Kubernetes, the public cloud and bare-metal. We are facing the challenge of fault-tolerant mission critical distributed systems and intend to deliver the world's best automation solution for delivering data platforms.
Experience using data platform tools is desirable, but not over hands-on experience installing, configuring and operating such technologies.

Description:

MUFG Investor Services is a member of the Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group, a leading global financial services group, aiming to deliver unparalleled experience to the Group’s customers by successfully meeting their continuous needs. We’ve a vision and a road map for becoming a standout service provider in the fund admin industry. We have the best in class technology to service our clients and we are constantly looking for improvements to stay a head of the curve.
We’re growing our local footprint in Cyprus and will be moving to a new state of the art office location this summer. Imagine your future at MUFG Investor Services where you can grow professionally, in a diverse and inclusive workplace that rewards your contribution.
MUFG Investor Services is a division of Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group, Inc (MUFG) one of the largest banks in the world with $3.3 trillion in assets. To learn more, please visit us at www.mufginvestorservices.com

Description:
Viva Wallet is a leading European cloud-based neobank, delivering the future of payments, now. With presence in 24 markets, it is the payment institution with the largest footprint in Europe. Viva Wallet's mission is to change the way businesses pay and get paid, offering truly unifying, yet localized, end-to-end advanced digital payments solutions and embedded banking services tailored to their needs. Latest innovations include “tap-on-phone Viva Wallet POS app” turning any Android mobile to a card terminal, and “Smart Checkout” payment gateway that can increase conversion by 21%. An advocate of sustainable cashless economy, Viva Wallet harnesses the power of their disruptive in-house technologies to provide digital payments services in 19 languages and 9 currencies, featuring over 24 payment methods.
The Team
The Data Services team of the BI Team is in charge of designing, implementing and maintaining a set of tools (APIs and services) which collect data (from data sources or event brokers), aggregate & distribute it both internally (services & apps) & externally (data direct to the customer, corporate website/backoffice/mobile app, 3rd party apps, country authorities across Europe etc.)

Description:
WeatherXM is building the world’s largest, community-powered, web3-native weather network to provide accurate, hyperlocal weather services to consumers and businesses. Based on low-cost web3 weather stations, WeatherXM allows anyone to become a weather station operator and earn rewards for collecting and validating weather data.
WeatherXM’s vision is to act as a web3 weather oracle to be used by on-chain protocols that have to make decisions based on weather conditions.
WeatherXM AG has raised $5M in seed funding to fuel the growth of their community-powered IoT weather station network. Placeholder VC led the round, joined by metaplanet, ConsenSys Mesh, dlab (SOSV), Protocol Labs, Borderless Capital, DLTx and several prominent angel investors including Juan Benet (Filecoin), Maxwell Krohn, Dimitris Togias and Ele Diakomichalis (Radicle).

Role purpose:
The Senior Big Data Engineer will design, implement, and maintain data pipelines in the Google Cloud Platform. The role is accountable to work closely with Product Owner to understand business needs and objectives as well as with BI Engineer to ensure the smooth data feed from various sources to GCP and afterward to Digital & Pega Destinations.
Key accountabilities and decision ownership:
Work closely with Product Owner, Solution Architect and Engineers to develop new flows and migrate the existing on premises infrastructure to GCP.

Description:
What you should know about us
MAN Energy Solutions enables it customers to achieve sustainable value creation in the transition towards a carbon neutral future. Addressing tomorrow's challenges within the marine, energy and industrial sectors, we improve efficiency and performance at a systematic level. Leading the way in advanced engineering for more than 250 years, we provide a unique portfolio of technologies. Headquartered in Germany, MAN Energy Solutions employs some 15,000 people at over 120 sites globally. Our after sales brand, MAN PrimeServ offers a vast network of service centers to our customers all over the world.
MAN Energy Solution Hellas Ltd is looking for a Data Engineer to work on identification of Internal Combustion Engine Components, Construction of Engine Spare Parts List Database and Maintenance of Spares Parts Database. The job requires you to work independently while you have a strong sense of community and can work in teams.

Our work environment is characterized by openness, where knowledge sharing is a natural part of everyday life. Freedom with responsibility is an integral part of our corporate culture.

Position Summary
Authentic Gaming is a supplier of Premium Live Casino software and services. With an established global presence, we offer the players of our B2B clients, premium, interactive, live-streamed games from exotic land-based casinos and live broadcasting studios. Our live casino games can be found on more than 200 websites, many of whom belong to leading Tier 1 online gaming operators. Description:
We are Kaizen Gaming

Our aim is to leverage cutting-edge Technology in order to provide the optimum experience to those who trust us for their entertainment.
The role & the team
As a Senior Frontend Engineer - Team Lead in one of our multidisciplinary autonomous Scrum teams you will develop modern applications for our products by using state of the art technologies. You will guide your team by analyzing and implementing new features focusing on our Sportsbook platform which includes a variety of services. More specifically, you will participate in the requirements elicitation, technical analysis and in collaboration with UI/UX designers you will have the opportunity to offer the best experience to our customers. Description:

At GWI we understand that software engineering is a multidisciplinary field that requires a team effort. Description:
Satori is an Analytics Agency made with one simple vision: to give clarity in decision making through data analytics.
Whether it’s a cloud-based big data ecosystem for a global fintech or a machine learning model predicting churn for a leading airline group, Satori develops cutting edge analytics solutions, providing real value to its clients. Services cover the whole data lifecycle from ingestion and warehousing to ML and AI applications.

Satori is a scale-up, well on track to become the leading data and analytics company in South-Eastern Europe and already a 65+ specialized tech team, consisting of Data Engineers, Data Scientists, Software Engineers, QAs, and CRM Specialists, delivering innovative data, tech, and customer experience solutions. The majority of our clients are household names and global brands in FMCG, retail, ecommerce, financial services, and travel, with a footprint in Greece but also across Europe and beyond.

Description:
At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.

The Opportunity

As part of our Data and Analytics team of Advisory practice you will work with multi-disciplinary teams to support clients in a wide range of big data initiatives aiming to generate and present new, useful and actionable insights. You will have the opportunity to work and take responsibilities in challenging engagements, gaining exposure to clients in various sectors both in Greece and abroad.

With over 2,000 employees of more than 88 nationalities, Exness is the place for global teamwork, incredible leadership, a learning culture, and constant development. Unlimited by time zones, Exnessians from around the world have worked seamlessly together since 2008 to provide our traders with the best possible trading experience. Today, we stand proud with over 300,000 active traders and 2.5 trillion USD in monthly trading volume.
Your role at Exness:
You will join our Market-making Operations team that combines unique expertise, knowledge, and responsibilities to continuously improve the pricing, execution models, and trading experience of our clients. You will be responsible for the administration of the core trading functions, maintaining trading platform components to provide the highest quality of services to clients. As a source of unique knowledge and experience, you will also play a crucial role in supporting all the teams within the company to achieve ambitious goals together.

Description:
Intelligencia.ai is a technology company at the heart of Healthcare and AI. Our mission is to bring novel therapies to patients faster and more efficiently by applying Data Science to Drug Development. We are pioneering the use of AI for assessing and addressing fundamental risks to maximize the odds of multiple life changing therapeutics.
Our people are the core of our success. We are a fast growing company that operates in a diverse, cross-functional and flexible environment. Our team consists of intellectually curious minds with a can-do attitude that love what they do and enjoy being part of a highly collaborative team. Together, we are solving complex problems and making a positive impact on people's lives by building cutting-edge technologies.
Our Engineering team is focused on applying engineering rigor and innovative design elements to our machine learning driven platform with a mission to accelerate drug development process. This role will be a key contributor to the design and implementation of data engineering pipelines to ingest billions of data points across hundreds of features from publications, patents, genomics, and many other sources.

Description:
Canonical is building a comprehensive automation suite to deliver a multi-cloud and on-premise data solution for the enterprise, which spans the full range of data stores and data technologies from big data, with Yugabyte, Spark and Kafka, through NoSQL and cache-layer capabilities like Redis, MongoDB and Opensearch, all the way to structured SQL engines like PostgreSQL and MySQL.
This is an exceptional opportunity for an experienced software engineer passionate about delivering high quality, reliable and automated infrastructure based on open source software running on Kubernetes, the public cloud and bare-metal. We are facing the challenge of fault-tolerant mission critical distributed systems and intend to deliver the world's best automation solution for delivering data platforms.
Experience using data platform tools is desirable, but not over hands-on experience installing, configuring and operating such technologies.

Description:
With over 2,000 employees of more than 88 nationalities, Exness is the place for global teamwork, incredible leadership, a learning culture, and constant development. Unlimited by time zones, Exnessians from around the world have worked seamlessly together since 2008 to provide our traders with the best possible trading experience. Today, we stand proud with over 300,000 active traders and 2.5 trillion USD in monthly trading volume.
Your role at Exness:
We are looking for an experienced data engineer who will join our Technology department to be part of a team of more than 400 engineers that creates cutting-edge solutions and constantly raises the bar.
This department focuses on developing products in the trading market and creating solutions from the moment of registration of clients to the moment of withdrawal of funds. Our technologies include resolutions that support customer journeys (identity management, billing management), trading interfaces (FIX, REST, WS, Algo), back-office interfaces (Personal Area, Payment Solutions, Back Office), centers of expertise (QA, DevOps, security), technology platforms (Orchestration, internal PaaS/SaaS), and much more.

Description:
Help us shape the future of photography
Born out of a passion for photography, we provide photographers with the tools to easily collaborate with clients and creatives, achieve the highest quality photographs, and bring their visions to life. We are on a journey to become the most efficient ecosystem of creative and collaborative tools with a flexible photography workflow seamlessly spanning across multiple devices, letting you work from anywhere and with anyone.

The role
Analytics are at the heart of Capture One’s success. In this role, you will empower the business through connecting the data of our 250K+ global customers, which enables us to turn data into actionable insights in support of our ambitious growth goals. We are looking for a Senior Data Engineer to become part of our Data & Insights team. You will build data pipelines to support decision-making across Finance, Marketing, Sales and Product & Technology. You will also have the opportunity to build machine learning models that help us act faster on customer needs. Our data architecture is based on Microsoft’s cloud service Azure, and we primarily use Power BI for our self-serve reporting.

Description:
Viva Wallet is a leading European cloud-based neobank, delivering the future of payments, now. With presence in 24 markets, it is the payment institution with the largest footprint in Europe. Viva Wallet's mission is to change the way businesses pay and get paid, offering truly unifying, yet localized, end-to-end advanced digital payments solutions and embedded banking services tailored to their needs. Latest innovations include “tap-on-phone Viva Wallet POS app” turning any Android mobile to a card terminal, and “Smart Checkout” payment gateway that can increase conversion by 21%. An advocate of sustainable cashless economy, Viva Wallet harnesses the power of their disruptive in-house technologies to provide digital payments services in 19 languages and 9 currencies, featuring over 24 payment methods.
The Team
The Data Services team of the BI Team is in charge of designing, implementing and maintaining a set of tools (APIs and services) which collect data (from data sources or event brokers), aggregate & distribute it both internally (services & apps) & externally (data direct to the customer, corporate website/backoffice/mobile app, 3rd party apps, country authorities across Europe etc.)

Description:
What you should know about us
MAN Energy Solutions enables it customers to achieve sustainable value creation in the transition towards a carbon neutral future. Addressing tomorrow's challenges within the marine, energy and industrial sectors, we improve efficiency and performance at a systematic level. Leading the way in advanced engineering for more than 250 years, we provide a unique portfolio of technologies. Headquartered in Germany, MAN Energy Solutions employs some 15,000 people at over 120 sites globally. Our after sales brand, MAN PrimeServ offers a vast network of service centers to our customers all over the world.
MAN Energy Solution Hellas Ltd is looking for a Data Engineer to work on identification of Internal Combustion Engine Components, Construction of Engine Spare Parts List Database and Maintenance of Spares Parts Database. The job requires you to work independently while you have a strong sense of community and can work in teams.

Our work environment is characterized by openness, where knowledge sharing is a natural part of everyday life. Freedom with responsibility is an integral part of our corporate culture.

Description:
WeatherXM is building the world’s largest, community-powered, web3-native weather network to provide accurate, hyperlocal weather services to consumers and businesses. Based on low-cost web3 weather stations, WeatherXM allows anyone to become a weather station operator and earn rewards for collecting and validating weather data.
WeatherXM’s vision is to act as a web3 weather oracle to be used by on-chain protocols that have to make decisions based on weather conditions.
WeatherXM AG has raised $5M in seed funding to fuel the growth of their community-powered IoT weather station network. Placeholder VC led the round, joined by metaplanet, ConsenSys Mesh, dlab (SOSV), Protocol Labs, Borderless Capital, DLTx and several prominent angel investors including Juan Benet (Filecoin), Maxwell Krohn, Dimitris Togias and Ele Diakomichalis (Radicle).

Viva Wallet is a leading European cloud-based neobank, delivering the future of payments, now. With presence in 24 markets, it is the payment institution with the largest footprint in Europe. Viva Wallet's mission is to change the way businesses pay and get paid, offering truly unifying, yet localized, end-to-end advanced digital payments solutions and embedded banking services tailored to their needs. Latest innovations include “tap-on-phone Viva Wallet POS app” turning any Android mobile to a card terminal, and “Smart Checkout” payment gateway that can increase conversion by 21%. An advocate of sustainable cashless economy, Viva Wallet harnesses the power of their disruptive in-house technologies to provide digital payments services in 19 languages and 9 currencies, featuring over 24 payment methods.
The Team
The Business Intelligence and Analytics team's purpose is to improve business decisions by providing all necessary information to all sectors (Management, Finance, Sales, Risk etc) using data gathered both internally and externally.

With an established global presence, we offer the players of our B2B clients, premium, interactive, live-streamed games from exotic land-based casinos and live broadcasting studios. We are Kaizen Gaming

Description:
At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.

The Opportunity

As part of our Data and Analytics team of Advisory practice you will work with multi-disciplinary teams to support clients in a wide range of big data initiatives aiming to generate and present new, useful and actionable insights. You will have the opportunity to work and take responsibilities in challenging engagements, gaining exposure to clients in various sectors both in Greece and abroad.

At TRG we work in a global environment where every diverse personality and culture is included. We look for talented people worldwide who have passion for what they do and work together, shoulder to shoulder, to empower our customers in their fight against crime and terror.
Though technology is important, people always come first!
We believe that good talent is not tied to a specific location and can be found anywhere!
Our Core Values are our DNA, so if your DNA matches ours you are at the right place!
Whatever it takes! We follow a can-do approach, taking responsibility for milestones.
Passion is our fuel! We Learn. We Grow. We Innovate.

Description:
Satori is an Analytics Agency made with one simple vision: to give clarity in decision making through data analytics.
Whether it’s a cloud-based big data ecosystem for a global fintech or a machine learning model predicting churn for a leading airline group, Satori develops cutting edge analytics solutions, providing real value to its clients. Services cover the whole data lifecycle from ingestion and warehousing to ML and AI applications.

Satori is a scale-up, well on track to become the leading data and analytics company in South-Eastern Europe and already a 65+ specialized tech team, consisting of Data Engineers, Data Scientists, Software Engineers, QAs, and CRM Specialists, delivering innovative data, tech, and customer experience solutions. The majority of our clients are household names and global brands in FMCG, retail, ecommerce, financial services, and travel, with a footprint in Greece but also across Europe and beyond.

Description:
Intelligencia.ai is a technology company at the heart of Healthcare and AI. Our mission is to bring novel therapies to patients faster and more efficiently by applying Data Science to Drug Development. We are pioneering the use of AI for assessing and addressing fundamental risks to maximize the odds of multiple life changing therapeutics.
Our people are the core of our success. We are a fast growing company that operates in a diverse, cross-functional and flexible environment. Our team consists of intellectually curious minds with a can-do attitude that love what they do and enjoy being part of a highly collaborative team. Together, we are solving complex problems and making a positive impact on people's lives by building cutting-edge technologies.

Description:
Canonical is building a comprehensive automation suite to deliver a multi-cloud and on-premise data solution for the enterprise, which spans the full range of data stores and data technologies from big data, with Yugabyte, Spark and Kafka, through NoSQL and cache-layer capabilities like Redis, MongoDB and Opensearch, all the way to structured SQL engines like PostgreSQL and MySQL.
This is an exceptional opportunity for an experienced software engineer passionate about delivering high quality, reliable and automated infrastructure based on open source software running on Kubernetes, the public cloud and bare-metal. We are facing the challenge of fault-tolerant mission critical distributed systems and intend to deliver the world's best automation solution for delivering data platforms.
Experience using data platform tools is desirable, but not over hands-on experience installing, configuring and operating such technologies.

The role
Analytics are at the heart of Capture One’s success. We are looking for a Senior Data Engineer to become part of our Data & Insights team. You will build data pipelines to support decision-making across Finance, Marketing, Sales and Product & Technology. You will also have the opportunity to build machine learning models that help us act faster on customer needs. Our data architecture is based on Microsoft’s cloud service Azure, and we primarily use Power BI for our self-serve reporting.

Your role at Exness:

Description:
Viva Wallet is a leading European cloud-based neobank, delivering the future of payments, now. With presence in 24 markets, it is the payment institution with the largest footprint in Europe. Viva Wallet's mission is to change the way businesses pay and get paid, offering truly unifying, yet localized, end-to-end advanced digital payments solutions and embedded banking services tailored to their needs. Latest innovations include “tap-on-phone Viva Wallet POS app” turning any Android mobile to a card terminal, and “Smart Checkout” payment gateway that can increase conversion by 21%. An advocate of sustainable cashless economy, Viva Wallet harnesses the power of their disruptive in-house technologies to provide digital payments services in 19 languages and 9 currencies, featuring over 24 payment methods.
The Team
The Data Services team of the BI Team is in charge of designing, implementing and maintaining a set of tools (APIs and services) which collect data (from data sources or event brokers), aggregate & distribute it both internally (services & apps) & externally (data direct to the customer, corporate website/backoffice/mobile app, 3rd party apps, country authorities across Europe etc.)

Description:
WeatherXM is building the world’s largest, community-powered, web3-native weather network to provide accurate, hyperlocal weather services to consumers and businesses. Based on low-cost web3 weather stations, WeatherXM allows anyone to become a weather station operator and earn rewards for collecting and validating weather data.
WeatherXM’s vision is to act as a web3 weather oracle to be used by on-chain protocols that have to make decisions based on weather conditions.
WeatherXM AG has raised $5M in seed funding to fuel the growth of their community-powered IoT weather station network. Placeholder VC led the round, joined by metaplanet, ConsenSys Mesh, dlab (SOSV), Protocol Labs, Borderless Capital, DLTx and several prominent angel investors including Juan Benet (Filecoin), Maxwell Krohn, Dimitris Togias and Ele Diakomichalis (Radicle).

Role purpose:
The Senior Big Data Engineer will design, implement, and maintain data pipelines in the Google Cloud Platform. The role is accountable to work closely with Product Owner to understand business needs and objectives as well as with BI Engineer to ensure the smooth data feed from various sources to GCP and afterward to Digital & Pega Destinations.
Key accountabilities and decision ownership:
Work closely with Product Owner, Solution Architect and Engineers to develop new flows and migrate the existing on premises infrastructure to GCP.

Description:
At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.

The Opportunity

As part of our Data and Analytics team of Advisory practice you will work with multi-disciplinary teams to support clients in a wide range of big data initiatives aiming to generate and present new, useful and actionable insights. You will have the opportunity to work and take responsibilities in challenging engagements, gaining exposure to clients in various sectors both in Greece and abroad.

At TRG we work in a global environment where every diverse personality and culture is included. We look for talented people worldwide who have passion for what they do and work together, shoulder to shoulder, to empower our customers in their fight against crime and terror.
Though technology is important, people always come first!
We believe that good talent is not tied to a specific location and can be found anywhere!
Our Core Values are our DNA, so if your DNA matches ours you are at the right place!
Whatever it takes! We follow a can-do approach, taking responsibility for milestones.
Passion is our fuel! We Learn. We Grow. We Innovate.

Description:
Intelligencia.ai is a technology company at the heart of Healthcare and AI. Our mission is to bring novel therapies to patients faster and more efficiently by applying Data Science to Drug Development. We are pioneering the use of AI for assessing and addressing fundamental risks to maximize the odds of multiple life changing therapeutics.
Our people are the core of our success. We are a fast growing company that operates in a diverse, cross-functional and flexible environment. Our team consists of intellectually curious minds with a can-do attitude that love what they do and enjoy being part of a highly collaborative team. Together, we are solving complex problems and making a positive impact on people's lives by building cutting-edge technologies.
Our Engineering team is focused on applying engineering rigor and innovative design elements to our machine learning driven platform with a mission to accelerate drug development process. This role will be a key contributor to the design and implementation of data engineering pipelines to ingest billions of data points across hundreds of features from publications, patents, genomics, and many other sources.

Description:
Canonical is building a comprehensive automation suite to deliver a multi-cloud and on-premise data solution for the enterprise, which spans the full range of data stores and data technologies from big data, with Yugabyte, Spark and Kafka, through NoSQL and cache-layer capabilities like Redis, MongoDB and Opensearch, all the way to structured SQL engines like PostgreSQL and MySQL.
This is an exceptional opportunity for an experienced software engineer passionate about delivering high quality, reliable and automated infrastructure based on open source software running on Kubernetes, the public cloud and bare-metal. We are facing the challenge of fault-tolerant mission critical distributed systems and intend to deliver the world's best automation solution for delivering data platforms.
Experience using data platform tools is desirable, but not over hands-on experience installing, configuring and operating such technologies.

With over 2,000 employees of more than 88 nationalities, Exness is the place for global teamwork, incredible leadership, a learning culture, and constant development. Your role at Exness:
We are looking for an experienced data engineer who will join our Technology department to be part of a team of more than 400 engineers that creates cutting-edge solutions and constantly raises the bar.
This department focuses on developing products in the trading market and creating solutions from the moment of registration of clients to the moment of withdrawal of funds. Our technologies include resolutions that support customer journeys (identity management, billing management), trading interfaces (FIX, REST, WS, Algo), back-office interfaces (Personal Area, Payment Solutions, Back Office), centers of expertise (QA, DevOps, security), technology platforms (Orchestration, internal PaaS/SaaS), and much more.

Description:
Viva Wallet is a leading European cloud-based neobank, delivering the future of payments, now. With presence in 24 markets, it is the payment institution with the largest footprint in Europe. Viva Wallet's mission is to change the way businesses pay and get paid, offering truly unifying, yet localized, end-to-end advanced digital payments solutions and embedded banking services tailored to their needs. Latest innovations include “tap-on-phone Viva Wallet POS app” turning any Android mobile to a card terminal, and “Smart Checkout” payment gateway that can increase conversion by 21%. An advocate of sustainable cashless economy, Viva Wallet harnesses the power of their disruptive in-house technologies to provide digital payments services in 19 languages and 9 currencies, featuring over 24 payment methods.
The Team
